node.name: initializationText
node.value:
Vil du gerne læse FB-Læser daglige tips? Nye tips vil blive hentet fra FB-Læser's websted. Forventet netværkstrafik er 1-2 kilobyte pr uge.
Vil du aktivere tips?

node.name: message1
node.value: FBReader works in fullscreen mode by default. Tap center third of the screen to show controls. You can change this behaviour in “Appearance” section of the Settings dialog.

node.name: message2
node.value: Well done! Now tap the center third again to hide the controls and this hint. If you want to keep controls on the screen during reading, select “Show action bar” option in “Appearance” section of the Settings dialog.

node.name: title
node.value: Plugin for %s files is not installed. Install right now?

node.value: Error %s in native code during reading '%s'

node.value: Der opstod en fejl under indlæsning af '%s'

node.name: errorReadingZip
node.value: Der opstod en fejl under udpakning af '%s'

node.name: unsupportedEncryptionMethod
node.value: File %s is encrypted with method that is not supported by FBReader. Some pages are not readable

node.name: text
node.value: FBReader cache directory is not accessible for writing. May be you forget to insert or unmount your memory card. Please fix this issue or select another directory.

node.name: text
node.value: FB-Læser kan ikke indlæse eget bibliotek. Måske er det ikke korrekt installeret. Hvis problemet fortsætter, bedes du prøve at geninstallere FB-Læser.
